label: 越訴
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: A second-level appeal of a lawsuit verdict. When a Kamakura shugo or the Bakufu's branch headquarters at Rokuhara settled a dispute, verdicts were commonly appealed to Kamakura. But osso could also be heard by Rokuhara itself, or by Kamakura in cases it had originally adjudicated.　［守護、六波羅］
